title: Negotiate a Letter of Intent (LOI)
description: A tenant client wants to lease an office space. The agent must draft and negotiate the LOI with the landlord's broker.

tasks.description: Draft the LOI with the client's desired terms: lease rate, term length, tenant improvement allowance, and other concessions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed LOI reflecting the client's goals.

tasks.description: Submit the LOI to the landlord's broker.
Receive a counter-offer from the landlord's broker, analyze the changes, and advise the client on the next steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the counter-offer and provides strategic advice.
